Package de.malkusch.validation.constraints.upload

Constraints for Spring's MultipartFile.

See: Description

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ContentType
    The MultipartFile must match a ContentType.
    ContentType.List
    Defines several ContentType annotations on the same element.
    Image
    The MultipartFile must be an image.
    Image.List
    Defines several Image annotations on the same element.
    NotEmptyBlob
    The Blob must not be empty.
    NotEmptyUpload
    The MultipartFile must not be empty.
    NotEmptyUpload.List
    Defines several NotEmptyUpload annotations on the same element.
    UploadSize Deprecated
    Use @Size annotation.
    UploadSize.List
    Defines several UploadSize annotations on the same element.

Package de.malkusch.validation.constraints.upload Description

Constraints for Spring's MultipartFile. If you want to use these constraints you have to provide spring-web.
Author:
Markus Malkusch
See Also:
MultipartFile
